
<div class="post-container detail interaction">

            </button>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="content-wrapper">
        <div class="prompt-display text-lg-left">
            What is this thing supposed to be?
        </div>

        <div class="post-description">
            <div class="response-display">

            </div>
        </div>

                <b>prompt</b>

            <div class="form-row">

                            name="prompt"

                            autofocus="true"

                    />
                </div>
            </div>

    </div>
